name: Conga Dungeon (7DRL version)
description:
THIS IS THE ORIGINAL 7DRL VERSION. SEE THE LATEST UPDATE HERE.

A cross between Crypt of the Necrodancer and Snake.

Maneuver your line of heroes to the beat while automatically attacking enemies.

Notes:

  • Controls: WASD/arrows
  • Works best in Google Chrome
  • Works best fullscreen

Check out the music: https://on.soundcloud.com/x1AXzZUNPtbEGL9z8

A game by:

  • Jeremiah Reid
  • Noah Jezyk
  • Bruno Torrano
  • trufata
